Danm. 37 o. 38, Tjecko^slov. 38, Tyskl. 39. Avd:ing. v. A-B Cykelfabr. Monark i Varberg 33-37, driftsing. där •sed. 37. Led. av styr. f. Varbergs ten-niiskl. sed. 36. Medll. av Frimurarorden. translated: Bartoldson, Erik Konrad, operating engineer, Varberg, born February 17, 1910 in Varberg to foreman Carl B. and Maja Andersson. Married in 1940 to Ingeborg Nyländer. Children: Inger born in 1942, Hans born in 1944. He completed his Realexamen (lower secondary education) in Varberg in 1927, and finished his vocational education at Borås Technical School in 1933. He studied in Germany in 1934, and travelled to Germany and Holland in 1936, Germany and Denmark in 1937 and 1938, and Czechoslovakia in 1938. He was a department engineer at AB Cykelfabr. Monark in Varberg from 1933 to 1937, and became an operating engineer there in 1937. He has been a board member of Varberg's tennis club since 1936, and is a member of the Freemasons. His hobbies are tennis and boxing.
